author: wn.com
title: 12/10/2015 - Schools Praised for Supporting Carers (Pembrokeshire County Council)
text: ( Source : Pembrokeshire County Council ) Two Pembrokeshire schools have been recognised for their support of Young Carers Milford Haven School and Greenhill School in Tenby have achieved the Bronze level of the Investors in Carers (IiC)
